game_name: Game name (such as FIRST POWER UP)

fields: All of the input Fields in the auto period (same style for teleop)

fields.name: some_identifier_name
fields.display_name: What is shows on the website
fields.type: text_box(can have newlines), int, string(cannot have newlines), boolean, enum
fields.default_value: the default value when scouting a new match
fields.max_value: max value for ints (this field is an int not a string
fields.min_value: do I have to explain this?
fields.max_length: max length for string, text boxes
fields.comments: DO NOT PUT ANY COMMENTS FIELD IN THE ACTUAL TEMPLATE

autonomous.duration: duration of the auto period (int field)

teleop.duration: the duration of the teleop period (int field)
